import express from 'express';
export function createFlowRoute(){ const app = express(); app.use(express.json()); app.get('/api/flow', (_req, res)=> res.json({ nodes: [], edges: [] })); app.post('/api/flow', (req, res)=> res.json({ ok: true, received: req.body })); return app; }
